document.full_text: debt worries hammered european markets on monday, knocking both the euro and regional shares down 1 percent while also weighing heavily on world equities, sending emerging markets down nearly 2 percent.
document.title: debt woes hammer euro and world stocks
lines_and_colors: debt worries hammered european markets on monday, knocking both the euro and regional shares down 1 percent while also weighing heavily on world equities, sending emerging markets down nearly 2 percent.
